# tf.contrib.eager.in_eager_mode

``` python
tf.contrib.eager.in_eager_mode()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/eager/context.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.6/tensorflow/python/eager/context.py).

Returns True if current thread is in EAGER mode for default context.
